s.text: Assuming this stuff is true, can you fathom the chutzpah of a guy who led the charge against Bill Clinton's affair with Monica Lewinsky--at one point saying the relationship showed that the president is a misogynist--while he was carrying on in a very similar fashion himself?
This isn't to suggest that there's any obligation--as you say about the mental health profession--to intervene against people who hold racist beliefs.
This isn't to suggest that there's any obligation--as you say about the mental health profession--to intervene against people who hold racist beliefs.
